about_the_game:
Game introduction

On a tropical island with endless scenery called the Moon, the hot summer sun shines through the treetops onto the fine white sandy beach, giving the entire island a golden glow. On this exotic island, an exhilarating obstacle course is about to begin.

Beautiful girls from all over the world gathered in this beautiful land, wearing lightweight bikini competition costumes, ready to face new challenges. On a breezy summer day, their eyes sparkle with determination and enthusiasm, as if they are vowing to become the best adventurers.

The challenge consists of a series of thrilling obstacle levels. Participants need to cross a variety of rotating objects, jump over clear blue water, climb steep platforms, and even have to pay attention to avoid the swinging suspension at all times. wooden ball. Each level is full of challenges and unknowns. Only courage and wisdom can help them overcome difficulties.

In addition to challenging levels, there are many fun activities on the island, such as yachting, swimming, sunbathing, etc. Enjoy discovering them.

In the end, only those girls who have overcome all obstacles, are brave, fearless, and intelligent can stand out and win victory and honor. The audience will also be immersed in this passionate and adventurous challenge, cheering for them and witnessing the birth of the brave.

On this moon island full of mystery and excitement, an obstacle challenge is about to begin. Let us embark on an adventure together and explore the wonderful world of courage, friendship and victory!

Game control

Use WSAD to control the character movement, mouse movement to control the viewing direction,you can also use a gamepad instead of in-game buttons and a mouse.use ESC/P to open the game menu.

Role introduction

Runa

Runa is a lively and sunny girl. She has passionate red short hair, a bright smile, and is always full of happiness and enthusiasm. Runa loves outdoor activities and enjoys participating in various sports, especially basketball and swimming. She likes making new friends, is always willing to help others,and is the most lively person in the class.

BoA

BoA is a quiet and gentle girl. She has long black hair and clear, gentle eyes. BoA enjoys quiet reading and painting, and is skilled in various handicrafts. She loves the beauty of nature and often tends to flowers and plants in the garden. BoA is a thoughtful and caring friend who always listens to others, providing warmth and support.

Karina

Karina is a strong and independent girl. She has sharp eyes and exudes a powerful aura. Karina is skilled in various martial arts techniques and enjoys challenging her limits. She is the leader of the school's karate club. She loves music and is adept at playing the guitar, often performing on campus. Despite her tough exterior, Karina is kind and caring, showing great concern for her friends and family.

Sylvia

Sylvia is a highly acclaimed professional model who hails from a bustling city. With numerous appearances on the covers of fashion magazines and walking the runways of top designers around the world, Sylvia exudes an elegant and captivating aura. Beyond her immense success in the fashion industry, Sylvia enjoys challenging herself and exploring new horizons. She is courageous and determined, believing that true beauty comes from the inner strength and resilience of the spirit.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages.The girls in this game wear swimsuits, which may be too nudity for some age groups.All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 3GB/AMD RX560 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060 8GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: On the beautiful Moon Island, an adventurous obstacle challenge is about to begin. Participants must overcome various obstacles. Only the bravest and smartest girls can emerge victorious, Let's embark on this adventure together and explore the wonderful world of courage, friendship, and victory!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
